players.name: Alice
memory: The villager Diana was found dead.
You: "Diana was killed, so the mafia is still alive. I think Bob is suspicious. Vote Bob."
Bob: "I didn't kill Diana. Charlie has a motive to find my role, and he's the only one who could know. I think he's the real mafia."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob, found him mafia. Alice, vote him. Bob, you’re the threat."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Bob
